text: ermoid - Hydrocephalus - Hydronephrosis - Hypoplasia of the corpus callosum - Hypoplasia of the iris - Linear hyperpigmentation - Lipoma - Lipomas of the central neryous system - Microphthalmia - Pelvic kidney - Peripheral pulmonary artery stenosis - Sclerocornea - Subaortic stenosis - Subcutaneous lipoma - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease databa
